title: Task Manager - Backend
description: This is complete backend solution for a task manager app built with node and express, using MongoDB for the database.

title: This website!
description: My first time working with Vue, built with Gridsome

title: NodeJS Weather App
description: Express server to get weather forecast based on location, deployed using Heroku

title: Bookmarks
description: Simple React application for keeping track of bookmarks. Authentication is provided by firebase. App also uses firestore to store and modify data. Routing is handled by Reach Router

title: Nodes App
description: Basic nodejs app for taking notes. Using Yargs for our command line arguments and chalk for displaying useful information to the user.

title: RPSLS
description: Rock Paper Scissors game built with vanilla JS, but modified to include Lizard and Spock to make the game more complex and fun..
